title: Cookies
cookiesExplanation1: Cookies are small files saved on your phone, tablet or computer when you visit a website.
cookiesExplanation2: We use cookies to make Court and Tribunal Hearings work and collect information about how you use our service.
cookiesExplanation3: Essential cookies keep your information secure while you use Courts and Tribunal Hearings. We do not need to ask permission to use them.
cookieTableData: Used to keep you signed in
Stores data within a form before it is submitted
analyticsExplanation: With your permission, we use Google Analytics and Dynatrace to collect data about how you use this service. This information helps us to improve our service.
